item.title: Re:Turn - One Way Trip is coming to Itch
item.description: Hello everyone, I'd like to thank all those who have played, play and record videos about Re:Turn - One Way Trip. Today I would like to announce that Re:Turn - One Way Trip is coming to Itch store. Th...

item.title: Re:Turn – One Way Trip is now available for purchase on both Steam and Xbox One
item.description: Re:Turn – One Way Trip is now available for purchase on both Steam and Xbox One, with PS4 and Switch coming real soon. It’s finally your (re)turn to play Re:Turn (sorry, we had that joke lying aro...

item.title: Re:Turn - One Way Trip is out on October 14th 2020!
item.description: We're very excited to announce that the release date for Re:Turn - One Way Trip has been set and will be available on the 14th October. Wishlist now and stay tuned for more info soon!...

item.title: Re:Turn - One Way Trip 2D Horror Adventure Heading to PC and Consoles Sep. 29 [Wishlist the game]
item.description: We're excited to announce that Green Man Gaming is the official publisher for our horror game Re:Turn - One Way Trip. Re:Turn will launch on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC-via Steam...

item.title: Our next big update is finally here
